abstract: New York Rangers are on top of their division and, at 16-4-2, only two points behind Montreal Canadiens for best record in NHL; credit success to outstanding play by goaltender Henrik Lundqvist and acknowledge need to improve offense but statistics show good luck has also been factor.
lead_paragraph: Generating few shots on goal and relying on goaltender Henrik Lundqvist to keep them in games, the Rangers realize their hot start is not good enough.

headline.main: With Luck on Their Side Thus Far, Rangers Look to Get Better
headline.print_headline: Riding Good Luck, Rangers Seek to Improve

snippet: Generating few shots on goal and relying on goaltender Henrik Lundqvist to keep them in games, the Rangers realize their hot start is not good enough.
